StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: Neutralizing antibodies against West Nile virus identified directly from human B cells by single-cell analysis and next generation sequencing

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap through dbGaP study accession number xxxxx. These data were published in "Neutralizing antibodies against West Nile virus identified directly from human B cells by single-cell analysis and next generation sequencing" (Tsioris et at., 2015) with funding from NIAID (U19-AI089992 and U19 AI089859). Data were provided by Ruth R Montgomery (Yale University) on behalf of her collaborators Steven H Kleinstein (Yale University) and J. Christopher Love (Massachusetts Institute of Technology). Montgomery and collaborators request that all publications and oral or written communications resulting from these data cite their original publication: Tsioris, Konstantinos, et al. "Neutralizing antibodies against West Nile virus identified directly from human B cells by single-cell analysis and next generation sequencing." Integrative Biology (2015). PMID: 26481611

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Immunological Research, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-IR-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Immunological Research. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
